data.actual_result: The server name gets cropped over the edge of the window
data.expected_result: Server name tooltip appears below the server so you can see it
data.short_description: Server names cropped when server icon is too close to the top of the window
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll your server bar until a server is showing a tiny bit of the circle - Hover your mouse over it - Observe server name
